name: Monitor
description: Find out your preferable Gaming, Professional & Regular Monitors at a reasonable price. We have a huge collection of HP, Lenovo, BenQ, Huawei etc.

name: CPU
description: central processing unit (CPU), principal part of any digital computer system, generally composed of the main memory, control unit, and arithmetic-logic unit.

name: MotherBoard
description: A motherboard is a printed circuit board or a PCB that creates the skeletal structure of a PC. It hosts components such as the Processor or CPU, graphics

name: Key Board
description: A computer keyboard is a peripheral input device modeled after the typewriter keyboard which uses an arrangement of buttons or keys to act as mechanical.

name: Printer
description: In computing, a printer is a peripheral machine which makes a persistent representation of graphics or text, usually on paper.

name: Mouse
description: A computer mouse (plural mice, sometimes mouses) is a hand-held pointing device that detects two-dimensional motion relative to a surface.
